about_the_game: Embark on an electrifying journey through the neon-lit streets of Tokyo in "Tokyo’s Neon Monsters" – an adrenaline-pumping fusion of real-time strategy and tower defence like you've never experienced before! Assemble your army of Neon Monsters to dominate the sprawling city map. With cunning strategy and lightning-fast reflexes, you'll seize control of key resources while fending off relentless waves of human and robotic adversaries hell-bent on toppling your monstrous empire. As night descends upon the city, engage in epic skirmishes against rival players, battling for supremacy amidst the glittering neon glow. And when dawn breaks, watch as your formidable monsters morph into towering stone guardians, standing sentinel against the relentless tide of humans yearning to reclaim their metropolis. With every pulse-pounding clash, collect precious resources to bolster your forces and unleash fiercer monsters upon your foes. Will you rise as the undisputed ruler of Tokyo's neon-lit streets, or will your dreams crumble beneath the relentless assault of your enemies? The city's fate hangs in the balance – it's time to unleash the Neon Monsters and claim your victory!
